message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to keep my spending within my budget. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
